name: Elf Shield, Blue
description: The blue Elf Shield is a glorious highly decorated shield symbolic of the elegance of the Elves. This curved, foam Larp shield has a beautiful hand painted embossed white winged heraldry accentuated by a silver star. The straps can be adjusted to fit with almost any style warrior.

name: Lion Shield, Green
description: The Green Lion Larp shield is a semi curved latex shield that is as versatile as it is beautiful. The beautifully carved foam shield has an embossed pattern and can withstand constant abuse and is made with rigid EVA foam. 80cm x 50cm

name: RFB Kite Shield, Black and Gold
description: The Black kite shield bears a similar resemblance to typical medieval shields but was intended for Larp use. The simple shape of this foam shield is outlined by a gold trim with rivets while the plain black center awaits your heraldry. 60cm x 36cm

name: Braced Shield
description: The concave form of the Braced shield is slight enough to deflect blows. This shield is the perfect size for someone with dexterity and who is quick on his feet. This Larp shield is perfect for rogues or rangers and is made for situations where size matters and safety is an issue. 60cm

name: Templar Shield, Red and Gold
description: A shield should never de far from a warrior or a knight. The small templar shield has adjustable straps for either left or right hands. The large cross really stands out from the rest making sure that all infidels know who you are. 70cm x 50cm

name: RFB Buckler, Steel
description: The RFB Steel Buckler shield is a small, versatile latex shield inspired by skilled swordsmen through history. This small round larp buckler has a neutral design befitting many character types, sculpted and painted to look like iron rimmed with brass. 36cm

name: RFB Round Shield, Sword
description: No matter the realm or the universe you play in this ready for battle round shield will help. It displays an embossed gold sword on a metal surface giving it a distinctive allure. Make your roleplay experience a safe one. 50cm

name: RFB Kite Shield, Sword
description: This Fantasy role play foam shield shows a embossed sword and is the perfect protection in any Larp. Confidently show off your heater shield as you carry it around from battle to battle. Itâ€™s light and small size makes it perfect for close quarter combat. 60cm x 36cm

name: RFB Round Shield,  Black and Green
description: The RFB green and black Round Shield is a simple, light weight shield mostly used by children.  The straps permit the fighter to wear it comfortably on the arm granting minimal protection.  Accentuated by a silver trim, this medieval shield will follow you into any battle. 50cm

name: Wooden Buckler
description: This simple but effective Wooden Buckler is an ideal shield for sparring. The single leather wrapped handle sits within the metal colored umbo(boss) protecting your hand during battle. The near realistic woodgrain on the front of the shield further accentuates this tiny medieval shield. 40cm

name: RFB Buckler, Black
description: The RFB Black buckler is a great small Larp shield to own. It can either be strapped to your arm or held in one hand. This foam shield is great for close quarter combat or as a small hand held shield for archers. A buckler latex shield is light and versatile and can be used in a wide range of battle situations. 36cm

name: RFB Kite Shield, Black and Red
description: The kite shield has a classic medieval appearance that can be used at any Larp event. Colored red and black and made from rigid foam it will provide some protection  as you enter your next adventure. 60cm x 36cm

name: RFB Round Shield, Black and Gold
description: The small Round Black Buckler Shield has two straps permitting the fighter to manipulate it in a multitude of ways. It can be easily strapped to an arm or held as a handle granting the wielder greater protection. This small beautiful foam shield gold trim accentuated by rivets and has a simple black finish. 50cm

name: Large RFB Shield, Black and Silver
description: The Large shield is just the right size to fight on the battlefront. Big enough to block but small enough to run through the woods, this foam shield is also priced for the debutante warrior. The multi strap system allows you a multitude of ways to hold your shield thus adapting it to any scenario. 100cm x 46cm

name: Lion Shield, Red
description: Made in the classic heater shield style this fabulous Latex Larp Lion Shield has intricate carved patterns showing the beauty of heraldry. Make this larp shield your favorite piece of Larp gear at your next Role Play event! 80cm x 50cm

name: Checkered Larp Shield, White
description: This ornate foam larp shield has a checkered black and white pattern with raised gold relief and trim. A hero needs his shield to protect him during Epic Larp battles and this latex shield does the trick. 80cm x 50cm

name: Elf Shield, Red 120cm
description: This foam Elf shield measures 120cm high and is inspired by the fantastic realm of the elves. This Curved kite shield has a beautiful hand painted red winged heraldry accentuated by a golden star. The straps on this shield can fit with almost any style fighter.

name: Scutum Rectangular Shield, Red
description: This latex Scutum shield is ideal for the warrior fighting in the roman legion. This large rectangular curved shield has a center grip and have a hand painted design. Light weight is made to resist hard combat making it perfect for the average Larp fighter. 100cm x 65cm

name: Oval Scutum Shield, Wood
description: From Romans to Celtics the heavy infantrymen from the early republic lined up in tight ranks using this type of shield. Although tactics did not change much since ancient times our foam shields have and Larping will never be the same. 100cm x 65cm

name: Viking Dragon Shield, White
description: With the praise of the gods behind you, you charge into battle with confidence, knowing that this large wooden shield will protect you. Gripped in the center and protected by a shield boss this round latex shield. 80cm

name: Eagle Shield, Green
description: As you strap this Green Eagle Shield tight to your arm, your pride kicks as you show your heraldry on the field of battle. Finished with a beautifully detailed laser-cut eagle pattern, this latex shield will fit perfectly in the hands of an warrior or knight. 80cm x 50cm

name: Viking Dragon Shield, Wood
description: As you grip this latex Viking dragon shield you will instantly feel the craze and adrenaline and the cry for war. The raised embossed golden dragon heads will be the last thing your enemies see as you bring your axe down upon them. 80cm

name: Lion Shield, White
description: The Lion Larp shield is a shining example of heraldry and pride. The embossed pattern of the white lion dominates this foam shield and is accentuate by a gold stripe and trim. Any knight or infantryman  can appreciate the solidity and charisma of this latex shield. 80cm x 50cm

name: Krom Shield
description: The Krom larp shield is a Viking style foam shield that will halt all in its path.  Become the ultimate marauder advancing through the lands crushing your enemies underfoot.  This oversized latex shield has what it takes to become shield brothers. 96cm

name: Titan Shield
description: The Titan Larp Shield is as impressive as it is practical. This is the largest foam shield on the market and was made for battles on the front lines. This latex shield can be used while wielding a polearm, remaining perfectly vertical and secure during combat. 132cm x 81cm

name: Checkered Larp Shield, Red
description: This medieval foam larp shield has an intricate carved checkered red and black pattern. This is a foam shield worthy of heroic battles and was designed with Larping in mind. 80cm x 50cm

name: Checkered Larp Shield, Green
description: This historical style foam larp shield has a checkered green pattern with raised  relief and trim. Become the epic hero that you always wanted to be. 80cm x 50cm

name: Steel Buckler Shield
description: Small round foam latex Buckler shield with a round shield boss, battle scars and studs. Made from rigid foam it will not flex in combat. This medieval inspired foam shield is comfortable, light weight and easy to control. It has a single grip covered in soft suede leather and is the perfect defense for close quarter combat. 40cm

name: RFB Kite Shield, Wood
description: Typical of any medieval shield, our RFB kite shield is made of rigid foam and coated in latex making it light and easy to carry all day. Perfect for the newly knighted ready to embark on his first adventure, this foam shield is safe for any larp. 60cm x 36cm

name: Large RFB Shield, Black and Green
description: The Large shield is just the right size to fight on the battlefront. Big enough to block but small enough to run through the woods, this foam shield is also priced for the debutante warrior. The multi strap system allows you a multitude of ways to hold your shield thus adapting it to any scenario. 100cm x 46cm

name: Gladiator Shield,  Wood
description: Like it once was long ago, the Gladiator Shield is perfect for arena combat. This curved shield has a central handle with emboss and is made from a hard foam safe for any combat. When used properly this shield will block most if not all weapon blows but provides minimum coverage against distance weapons. 60cm x 50cm

name: Eliptical Shield, Red
description: The Elliptical Shield is similar to that of an ancient shield used by the Celts. This small oval shield has a single handle with protective hand guard.  The central handle allows the user to give distance between him and the offender by extending your arm you can block the vision gaining a tactical advantage. 70cm x 45cm

name: Elven Buckler
description: Beautiful Elven buckler made of soft durable foam covered with leather. This small shield can be held in your hand or strapped to your arm, leaving your hand free to fight two handed style. 48cm x 30cm

name: Latex Northstar Shield
description: The North Star battle shield was made for hard core fantasy battles, its unique design and shape inspires troops to battle. Available in three sizes this larp shield is curved to contour your body providing maximum coverage during epic battles.

name: Roman Tower Shield, Red and Gold
description: This latex Roman Tower Shield is hexagonal shaped with a boss in the middle. The colors are roman to the bone, bright red and gold. The shield has our Multi-Grip system with three possible settings; left arm, right arm, and downward. 120cm x 70cm

name: Footmans Tower Shield
description: The true foam medieval latex tower shield was intended to be used on the battle front and will not bend easily. Whether to provide cover for your pike-man or archer, or to simply provide maximum coverage this lightweight Larp Shield is what you need to defend your king. 120cm x 60cm

name: Large Viking Shield
description: Known for its versatility in battle, this sturdy curved latex Viking shield has a hollow foam umbo or shield boss and has a concave shape. Light weight, this wood shield is perfect for epic larp battle and possibly the best latex shield you will ever buy. 69cm.

name: Orc Shield
description: Taunt your opponents with this battered latex Larp shield with imitation cord handles. The shield has a horizontal handgrip with adjustable leather straps build into the frame, for maximum shield control. 60cm X 66cm

name: Imperial Shield
description: The Imperial latex shield represents chaos and battle and is a beautiful shield to have. The large skull with wears a crown of leaves and appears in sharp contrast to the dark red background. Adjustable leather straps allow you to wear this shield on the right of left arms. 80cm x 62cm

name: Knight Shield
description: The classic medieval knight larp shield is represented in a colorful green latex shield with white and gold stripes whose shape is similar to a jousting shield. The contour of the shield had a metal band adorned with large gold rivets and can really take some major blows. 80cm x 52cm

name: Templar Shield , Wood
description: A shield should never de far from a warrior or a knight. The small templar shield has adjustable straps for either left or right hands. The large cross really stands out from the rest making sure that all infidels know who you are. 70cm x 50cm

name: Templar Shield,  White and Red
description: A shield should never de far from a warrior or a knight. The small templar shield has adjustable straps for either left or right hands.The large cross really stands out from the rest making sure that all infidels know who you are. 70cm x 50cm

name: Lionidas Shield
description: This greek Lionidas foam shield is the perfect greek shield. The hand grip on the back of this latex shield is one complete unit, with handle and adjustable leather strap build in a frame, for maximum shield control. 70cm

name: Wing Shield
description: Impress your fellow Larpers with this blue latex wing shield. Golden runes adorn the edges of this fantasy Larp shield while the dragon wing makes you impervious to blows. Leather straps adjust to the wearer for added comfort. 100cm X 50cm

name: Shield of Lorian
description: The great latex shield of Lorian is an ornate, elegant this latex shield will surely impress your fellow elves. Hollowed foam umbo provides a cushion during battle against Orcs or trespassers in the sacred forest.  Runes embellish the golden contours of this regal shield while etchings cover its surface.The single center handle allows this shield great...

name: Eliptical Shield, Black
description: The Elliptical Shield is similar to that of an ancient shield used by the Celts. This small oval shield has a single handle with protective hand guard.  The central handle allows the user to give distance between him and the offender by extending your arm you can block the vision gaining a tactical advantage. 70cm x 45cm

name: Gladiator Shield, Red
description: Like it once was long ago, the Gladiator Shield is perfect for arena combat. This curved shield has a central handle with emboss and is made from a hard foam safe for any combat. When used properly this shield will block most if not all weapon blows but provides minimum coverage against distance weapons. 60cm x 50cm

name: Star Buckler
description: The Star Buckler shield is a great close quarter shield to have when sparring. Its unique raised star pattern found on the front of the shield is bound within its round shape, giving this shield a unique fantasy appearance. 40cm

name: Steel Buckler
description: The small steel buckler is ideal defence for any swordsman engaged in a duel. The two tone steel effect with a raised cross pattern is further accentuated by rivets on the front of the foam shield.  Easy to carry and wield this small shield breathes simplicity but is very useful indeed. 40cm

name: Large RFB Shield, Black and Red
description: The Large shield is just the right size to fight on the battlefront. Big enough to block but small enough to run through the woods, this foam shield is also priced for the debutante warrior. The multi strap system allows you a multitude of ways to hold your shield thus adapting it to any scenario. 100cm x 46cm

name: Raider Shield
description: This hexagon shaped shield is Called the Raider. This refined foam shield is slightly cupped and brandishes a steel border with cross. Ideal for a brigand or barbarian, this larp shield can be used by most anyone who has good agility in battle. 50cm

name: RFB Round Shield, Black %26 Red
description: This small round foam shield is ideal for children.  It is very light, can be handled with ease and is very safe. Made entirely of foam this Red and Black Shield, this enchanting shield will protect your child on his first adventure. 50cm

name: RFB Round Shield, Wood
description: This small round foam shield is ideal for children.  It is very light, can be handled with ease and is very safe. Made entirely of foam this Wood Grain Shield, this enchanting shield will protect your child on his first adventure. 50cm

name: RFB Buckler, Wood
description: The Wood Buckler is basically a small shield to block and parry larp weapons. Made from rigid foam you can use the adjustable straps to either strap it to your arm or to hold it in your hand. Either way one must be proficient to use this small but fabulous shield. 36cm

name: Viking Shield, Small
description: This is a smaller version of the typical Viking shield. It may be used by any warrior or barbarian eager to get onto the field and die with dignity.  Just larger than a buckler this realistic shield is made entirely of foam and has a rubber handle. 50cm.

name: Star Shield
description: The Star shield is more of a fantasy based shield and was designed to be used the same way as a Viking shield.  Conquer one city at a time with this Larp foam Shield. 60cm

name: RFB Kite Shield, Black and Green
description: Typical of any medieval shield, our RFB kite shield is made of rigid foam and coated in latex making it light and easy to carry all day. Perfect for the newly knighted ready to embark on his first adventure, this foam shield is safe for any larp. 60cm x 36cm

name: Large RFB Shield, Wood
description: The Large Wood shield is just the right size to fight on the battlefront. Large enough to block but small enough to run through the woods, this foam shield is also priced for the debutante warrior.  The multi strap system allows you a multitude of ways to hold your shield thus adapting it to any scenario. 100cm x 46cm

name: Ironshod Shield
description: Slightly larger than a buckler and smaller than a targ, this Ironshod Shield has a wood grain finish and ha simulated iron bands along its edge and across the centre. The central handle gives the weilder full control and allows for multiple styles of combat.  Made from durable foam it is safe for most any larp. 60cm

name: Marauder Shield
description: The latex Marauder shield is the perfect size shield for skirmishers and woodsmen alike. The simulated steel shield sports a unique chaos pattern on the front in gold relief. The Central handle is housed by an umbo protecting the hand and giving full control to the fighter. 60cm

name: Gobbo Shield
description: This medieval larp Gobbo foam shield has a horizontal rigid hand grip. The hand grip on the back of this latex shield is one complete unit, with handle and adjustable leather strap build in a frame, for maximum shield control. 55cm
